entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Arviat

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog at times. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog at times. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning. Fog at times. Wind south 20 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Sunday 30 April 2023
